eb471632349deac4b62f8dec853c8ceb64c9617a.commitMessage: YARN-5200. Enhanced "yarn logs" to be able to get a list of containers whose logs are aggregated via a "show_container_log_info" option. Contributed by Xuan Gong.

87f5e351337a905af5215af76c72b9312616cd4f.commitMessage: YARN-4842. Fixed "yarn logs" command to guess (and thus not require) the appOwner argument when viewing another user's logs. Contributed by Ram Venkatesh and Xuan Gong.
